document.docAuthor: Gadallah, Neveen S., Ghahari, Hassan, Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier & Fischer, Maximilian
document.masterDocTitle: Updated checklist of Iranian Opiinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Updated checklist of Iranian Opiinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution in Iran .
Lorestan (
Ghahari et al . 2012 a
).

Host records. In Finland , it is reported from several Anthomyiidae species ( Diptera ):
Pegomya betae (Curtis, 1847 )
and
P. hyoscyami (Panzer, 1809 )
on
Beta vulgaris
L.,
P. nigritarsis (Zetterstedt, 1838 )
on
Rumex acetosa
L.,
P. nigrisquama (Stein, 1888 )
on
Solidago virgaurea
L., P. s t ei n i (Hendel, 1925 ),
Delia radicum
(L., 1758 ) (
Fischer and Koponen 1999
).
Yu et al . ( 2012 )
reported
Delia antiqua (Meigen, 1826 )
,
D. radicum
(L., 1758 ),
Pegomya bicolor (Wiedemann, 1817 )
,
P. hyoscyami (Panzer, 1809 )
,
P. nigrisquama (Stein, 1888 )
,
P. solennis (Meigen, 1826 )
, and P. s t ei ni (Hendel, 1925 ) ( Diptera : Anthomyiidae ).
